page.title: 06PERSONALITIES - POLICEMAN
page.content: The local{policeman}is called Mick Aitchinson and is stationed at Birch although his headquarters are at Tiptree. He receives radio messages from Chelmsford. He travels his large{beat,}the villages of Birch, Layer de la Haye, Wigborough and Salcott, in a police car, an Opel Chevet. Sometimes P.C. Aitchinson visits Birch Primary School to give talks and films about{road safety. When he comes to school he sometimes shows us how to take fingerprints and how to use the radio in his car. The most common{crimes}he deals with are poaching, theft of building materials and household goods. If serious crimes are committed he can get help from the C.I.D, call in police dogs and fingerprint experts.
